item.title: Consumers are now blending their physical and digital experiences. How should companies respond?
item.description:
A new study emphasizes the importance of personalization in merging online and offline shopping experiences for “phy-gital” consumers. The study found that while companies are embracing digital technologies, they are lagging in implementing personalization strategies that consumers desire. The study revealed that personalized promotions significantly influence purchasing decisions, encouraging consumers to buy familiar products and explore new ones. However, there’s a disconnect between consumer expectations and company investments.
